ComicInfo.Summary: With the forces of the undead converging on the Nation's capital from outside the Beltway, the army of zombies created within explodes with cannibalistic fury and the thinly-stretched forces of the National Guard are nearly powerless to curb the tide of murder sweeping through Washington D.C. As the living dead claw at the very gates of the White House, desperate measures give way to a flight for survival. No one is safe, no one is immune and there is nowhere to run as the Apocalypse approaches, ushered in by the clawing hands of blood-thirsty fiends intent of devouring every living human in their path.
ComicInfo.Title: 5 (of 5)
